last_episode_to_air.name: Christmas Wishes
last_episode_to_air.overview: Thando reels from family secrets. At work, Ben drops a bombshell. At a family Christmas dinner gathering, Thando reveals her surprise.

name: Yoh! Christmas
overview: Single, 30 and under pressure, Thando lies to her family that she has a boyfriend. Now she has 24 days to bring one home for Christmas. Can she do it?

episodes.name: The Christmas Lie
episodes.overview: Thando dodges her ex — who is married with a kid — and gets tapped to work Christmas Eve. How much worse can it get when she goes to a singles mingle?

episodes.name: Dating
episodes.overview: Thando tries a dating app. Later, Charles posts a pic of her that gets hundreds of likes — and a celeb in her DMs. A favorite patient offers advice.

episodes.name: Something New, Something Old
episodes.overview: Motheo has stunning news for Thando. Xolani sends a gift to the hospital. At home, the pressure is on: Mom has a place card for "Thando's boyfriend."

episodes.name: Naughty but Nice
episodes.overview: At a work party, a tipsy Thando reveals her woes to Ben. Later, they discover something in common. Sifiso brings his family to a holiday gathering.

episodes.name: Cut the Cake
episodes.overview: Charles and Minnie help Thando drown her sorrows after a embarrassing encounter. As the evening ends, she spots a couple in a car — and gets suspicious.

episodes.name: Christmas Wishes
episodes.overview: Thando reels from family secrets. At work, Ben drops a bombshell. At a family Christmas dinner gathering, Thando reveals her surprise.
